declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @sys varchar(32), @user int, @admin bit select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @key = ''
create table #r(ma_nv varchar(32), ten_nv nvarchar(512), stt_rec_nv varchar(13), ten_vtr nvarchar(512), ma_mh varchar(32), ten_mh nvarchar(512), ngay_tu smalldatetime, ngay_den smalldatetime, loai_hinh_dt varchar(32), ten_dt nvarchar(512), ghi_chu nvarchar(512), stt int)
-- Key if @admin = 0 begin select @key = '(b.bo_phan in (select k.ma_bp from hrbp k, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp h where dbo.ff_Inlist(k.bp_ref, h.r_access2) = 1 and h.user_id = @@userID))' end
select @key = case when @key = '' then '' else ' and (' + @key + ')' end
select @q = 'insert into #r(ma_nv, ten_nv, stt_rec_nv, ten_vtr, ma_mh, ten_mh, ngay_tu, ngay_den, loai_hinh_dt, ten_dt, ghi_chu, stt)' select @q = @q + ' select a.ma_nv, b.ten, b.stt_rec, b.ten_vtr%l, a.ma_mh, c.ten_mh%l, a.ngay_tu, a.ngay_den, a.loai_hinh_dt, d.ten_loai%l, ghi_chu, a.stt' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a left join vhrnv b on a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv' + @key select @q = @q + ' left join hrdmmh c on a.ma_mh = c.ma_mh left join hrdmlhdt d on a.loai_hinh_dt = d.ma_loai' exec sp_executesql @q
select '' as message, 'this.frameElement.result = @@result;parent.set$Grid$ImportResult(this.frameElement);' as script select @q = 'select ma_nv, ten_nv, stt_rec_nv, ten_vtr, ma_mh, ten_mh, ngay_tu, ngay_den, loai_hinh_dt, ten_dt, ghi_chu from #r order by stt' exec sp_executesql @q return
